title: Maya Hawke gives a drunk naked insight into ‘life of a movie star’
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Maya Hawke has given fans an insight into the ‘life of a movie star’ as she shared a bizarre drunk and naked tour of Loyal Studios.

Uma Thurman and Ethan Hawke’s daughter posted the video on her Instagram feed, as she walked around the film studio in Los Angeles, covered in glitter with just a backwards jacket covering her.

She told her followers: ‘Oh, hi. Welcome to the life of a movie star. If you were ever wondering what it was like to be famous, this is it.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘It’s very glamorous and sexy and everybody wants to sleep with you and kiss you all the time.

‘People give you lots of free food and free clothes and free alcohol. I basically I just never pay for a thing.’

The 21-year-old actor and model also admitted she was drunk while filming the clip, which seemed to be during some downtime during filming for her upcoming movie Mainstream.

As well as her upcoming role, Maya has also starred in Stranger Things (Picture: Rex Features)

Maya walked around in nothing but a backwards jacket (Picture: Instagram)

She also clarified that he marks on her back were from a holistic treatment, telling fans: ‘Mainstream 2020 (plus I got some cupping done I did not get attacked by an octopus).’

Mainstream is being directed by Gia Coppola and also stars Andrew Garfield and Johnny Knoxville alongside Maya.

According to Variety, the film will be released next years and focuses on ‘an eccentric love triangle and cautionary tale of preserving your identity within the fast-moving internet age’.

Maya has already been making waves while following in the footsteps of her thespian parents, with a role in Stranger Things and Once Upon A Time In Hollywood under her belt.
